com.vdisk.net.session

接口 Session

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractSession, VDiskAuthSession

    public interface Session
    Keeps track of a logged in user. Contains configuration options for the VDiskAPI.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  Session.AccessType 
      static class  Session.ProxyInfo
      Describes a proxy.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AccessToken getAccessToken()
      Returns the currently logged in user's access token.
      Session.AccessType getAccessType()
      Returns what VDisk access type to use (currently app folder or entire VDisk).
      String getAPIServer()
      Returns the VDisk API server.
      AppKeyPair getAppKeyPair()
      Returns the app key and secret.
      String getContentServer()
      Returns the VDisk content server.
      Context getContext() 
      HttpClient getHttpClient()
      Will be called every time a request is made to VDisk, in case you want to use a new client every time.
      Session.ProxyInfo getProxyInfo()
      Will be called every time a request is made to VDisk, in case the proxy changes between requests.
      String getUploadServer()
      Returns the VDisk upload server.
      String getWebServer()
      Returns the VDisk web server.
      AccessToken getWeiboAccessToken()
      Returns the currently logged in user's Weibo access token.
      boolean isLinked()
      Returns whether or not this session has a user's access token and secret.
      void setRequestTimeout(HttpUriRequest request)
      Will be called every time right before a request is sent to VDisk.
      void sign(HttpRequest request)
      OAuth signs the request with the currently-set tokens and secrets.
      void unlink()
      Unlinks the session by removing any stored access token and secret.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAppKeyPair

        AppKeyPair getAppKeyPair()
        Returns the app key and secret.

      • getAccessToken

        AccessToken getAccessToken()
        Returns the currently logged in user's access token.

      • getWeiboAccessToken

        AccessToken getWeiboAccessToken()
        Returns the currently logged in user's Weibo access token.

      • getAccessType

        Session.AccessType getAccessType()
        Returns what VDisk access type to use (currently app folder or entire VDisk).

      • isLinked

        boolean isLinked()
        Returns whether or not this session has a user's access token and secret.

      • unlink

        void unlink()
        Unlinks the session by removing any stored access token and secret.

      • sign

        void sign(HttpRequest request)
        OAuth signs the request with the currently-set tokens and secrets.
        参数:
        request - an HttpRequest.

      • getProxyInfo

        Session.ProxyInfo getProxyInfo()
        Will be called every time a request is made to VDisk, in case the proxy changes between requests. Return null if you do not want to use a proxy, or a Session.ProxyInfo object with a host and optionally a port set.

      • getHttpClient

        HttpClient getHttpClient()
        Will be called every time a request is made to VDisk, in case you want to use a new client every time. However, it's highly recommended to create a client once and reuse it to take advantage of connection reuse.

      • setRequestTimeout

        void setRequestTimeout(HttpUriRequest request)
        Will be called every time right before a request is sent to VDisk. It should set the socket and connection timeouts on the request if you want to override the default values. This is abstracted out to cope with signature changes in the Apache HttpClient libraries.

      • getAPIServer

        String getAPIServer()
        Returns the VDisk API server. Changing this will break things.

      • getContentServer

        String getContentServer()
        Returns the VDisk content server. Changing this will break things.

      • getWebServer

        String getWebServer()
        Returns the VDisk web server. Changing this will break things.

      • getUploadServer

        String getUploadServer()
        Returns the VDisk upload server. Changing this will break things.

      • getContext

        Context getContext()
